title: Argentina : poverty headcount ratio at 3.20 U.S. dollars per day 2005 to 2017
summary: In general Percentage of population has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Percentage of population, of value 8.0 was reached at Year 2006
Minimum Percentage of population about 2.4 was reached at Year 2013, and 2016
